E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And sometimes the unguis with the sole unguent stretched out as we have said before, and then it is cauterized with the fire of which this is its shape:
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And beware that with the spatula you do not touch the tunica cornea and that it does not come in a rupture, and that the pupil is perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then the incision goes in the eye a little salt or vinegar, and let it go in there another day, and then heal that with what it comes in so that it is healed.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	If the nail is not nervous and you cannot insert the needle, nor is it stuck in that place, then this type of nail is healed with medicines, and is cured as I said and recommended in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you want to split it, then open the mouth of the patient and take a thin, pointed spatula according to this form:
am subtilitat.	with subtlety.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if you see that it is rarefied and dispersed and has taken on an odor, then distill from your mouth into the wound made of rosemary or with red wine or with salt dissolved, and pour the liquid in through the other side the next day.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the operation as long as everything from him is expelled; otherwise, a cauterized ulcer will be in the wound, and you will let it be, and cure the ulcer at its beginning until it is healed.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat your operation on that with reason until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The tear gland, if it is noted in the eye due to great harm, should be suspended with a thread; and insert that from one side, and do not finish the insertion so that there are no outbursts of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	Then distill into the tear gland red wine and rosemary made into a salve until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter .xvii.
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	Of the incision of a wound and of what is born of flesh pressed in the wound.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Sometimes in wounds of the eyes, flesh that is red is born, and it covers the pupil, or approaches or stretches out over the eyelids, and it strongly presses on the lids into the holes, and is assembled to the appearance of marble.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	The operation on him is that the patient rests his head in your lap; and then open the wounds of those, and gather up all that flesh with convenient threads, and take it by one end with a forceps or with a basket; and then insert the flesh at the beginning so that everything is finished with the scissors, and be careful of the wound so that you do not hurt it with your operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And your incision should be with the one by which you insert those or with a spatula which we recommended in the incision of the nail, or with small scissors by which is gathered ash according to the form that will come the chapter next to this one.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Therefore when your incision is complete and all that flesh has been expelled, then fill the wound with ground salt, or distill into it powdered red salve resembling the corrosive medicines, and place over the wound dry cotton wool until an ulcerated cauterized wound is formed.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	And if any cause of wounds and cauterized blood occurs and you fear an ulcerated wound, then let the wound be and cure that ulcer with what eases that ulcer, and then repeat your operation on it until it is healed, and similarly do to the flesh which you find in the wound of this type.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However you must be careful about removing all cure of the wound by natural or accidental way, working with iron, and not putting your hand in any of these operations until you see that that member has endured that operation.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter .xviii.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	Of the collection of pus in the wound.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Pus are red veins which are knotted on the wound and forbid the opening of its operation, and they discharge the wound over the course of days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore it is necessary at the beginning for you to consider if the wound in which there is pus is strong and there is not another sickness in it other than pus, then gather up that pus.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And you should command the patient to rest his head in your lap, and then suspend those veins with a thread or two according to your prudence; and that thread should be of subtle double thickness according to this form:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or two threads grading into one body according to this form:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	And then gather up those veins with strong subtle threads, and wipe away the blood hour by hour, until you see that those veins are expelled from the wound and are turned around.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And be careful that you do not hurt the wound with the end of the spatula; and if your operation is on the right side in front of the sun, then be firm in your operation so that you insert only those veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have completed it, then you distill into the wound wine or rosemary so that with its sharpness it corrodes what is expelled from the pus.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	But if it is not possible for you to gather it all in that hour, then you apply a plaster on everything so that it eases his pain, and let him be for several days until his pain is eased and he is guarded from an ulcerated wound.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat your operation according to the same manner so that it is healed.
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	And this is the form of the scissors:
Capitol .xix.	Chapter .xix.
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	Of the reduction of a herniated testicle to the nose.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you cure a herniated testicle with cauterization or with burning medicine according to how it is described and is not healed, then do not place anything on it except that you make an incision over the ulcer due to its maturity, and extract all the humidity which is in it and the pus until the bone is uncovered.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And therefore when the bone is uncovered and you see in it corruption or blackness, then scrape it with an instrument of which this is the form:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	And it is named a sharp head, and it is made of iron, and the head should be round like an awl of which the tip is made pointed by drilling or sharpened subtlety (just as in the following form).
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	And place that over the corroded part of the bone, and then turn it between your fingers, and press your hand gently little by little until you know that the corruption is scraped.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	And this should be done several times, then restore the place with drying and constricting causes.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	Therefore if the place is consolidated and there is good flesh born in it and the body has separated from the sickness and it has been for 40 days, and it is not renewed and there is no ulcer formed and an accident does not occur on it, then you know that it is healed.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	But if not, then do not place anything on it except to reduce the fissure to the form of the nose, and according to this manner: and you uncover the bone with iron or with sharp medicine, and when the bone is uncovered, then take a thread according to this form:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	Let the end of it be triangular, and the stalk of it should be bent inward at the end just as you see there.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Then place that over the bone, and let it be near the tear gland; and lengthen your hand a little from the wound, and then turn your hand with the thread until you penetrate all the bone, and he feels the patient through the ass that blocks wind emission because of it.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Then restore the place with drying and constricting medicines just as I have taught you.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	Therefore when the flesh and the place are hardened, then the matter which flows to the openings on the sides returns to the nose; therefore that is pus easier on the patient.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter .xx.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	Of the reduction of the prominence of the wound.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the wound swells in its entirety and there is no occurrence of pain nor decrease, then know that you should loosen the patient, then the following, and then pause vents on the neck during the scarification and sucking for a good sucked; then pause over the wound liniment which is made from aloes and aloe and myrrh, and then strengthen the plaster over the wound with moist powders.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	And the manner of the powders is that you take pieces of linen cloth, and each piece is folded in four; and make those folds.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	Then place those one on top of the other according to the quantity that he has need of.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	Then bind tightly over them with a strong bandage, and repeat the cupping with suction without scarification; then remove the cups and let him be bound tightly day and night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	But if in the meantime the ligament softens, then let it be looser.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	Then remove the bandage day and night as we have said.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if you see that he is reduced, good; but if not, then repeat the ointment with the powders and the bandage and the cupping until he is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 21.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	Of the beginning of the swelling of the tunica uberia.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When there is a disruption in the tunica uberia and it becomes prominent and protrudes outside the eyelids like a grain of rice, and assumes a form like that of a man's nail, and you want to operate on it, then the operation is performed as we have described: You insert a needle into the root of the uberia at the lower part, and you place another needle in which there is a thread doubled in the lacrimal part, and make that penetrate and let the first needle follow its course; then you pierce the site of the double thread and lift with it the part of the uberia in the circuit of the needle, and bind that tightly.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	Then remove the needle and place over it wool infused with white vinegar and let it stay until the thread comes away with the uberia.

E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	And sometimes one gathers all the parts with a circle of cloth around the affected area, and let it be pierced by the spatula through the white humor, and let the moisture flow, and let the eye go down and recover at once.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	Then bind it until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22.
De curacio de alconati.	Of the cure of hawks.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This disease which is called alconati is nothing but an inflammation which is located in the eye, resembling water and not pus.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	But the manner of treating it is that you make the patient sit on a raised and straight seat, and you take hold of his head in your hands from both sides, and keep him there until you see the inflammation come to the lower parts; then let it be dried up and not go down, and let the light be seen, and let the patient see the causes as he used to.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not go down below, you know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	But if the inflammation is not prepared to go down with what we have said, then let the patient sit between your hands and take a spatula and rub it on the membrane covering a little from the continuation of the conjunctiva into the cornea in the rim (in that very place), until the inflammation goes away.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Then when it is gone, you distill into the eye water mixed with honey in which you have boiled fenugreek and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And let him be cured of the other causes until he is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	Of the cure of water coming down from the eye.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	We have already said about the qualities of the water in the division and which one is suitable for piercing with a needle according to the condition; then let that be done according to his health.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Then you see that you make him sit between your hands over a pitcher and open his eye wide, he pulls his eye up.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre. E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	Then take the palm of your right hand, if the eye is left; or with the palm of your left hand, if it is right.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	Then place the end of your palm near the rim because of the thickness of the membrane in the white of the eye in the part of the tear gland, and press your hand with that.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	Then penetrate into the white of the eye and feel that your palm has already reached to the cause seen.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	And let the distance of the path of your palm to the rim be the measure of the space which is from the pupil into the end of the darkness, and it is the rim of the eye; for you will see with that pupil by means of the vision of the eye because of the brightness of the tunica cornea.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.
